definition: office/situation/classifier for games: match, set, round etc
to go/to take/sentence-final interrogative particle/variant of 於|于[yu2]

sentences.english: The shortcomings of China’s medical system are hardly limited to cosmetic and plastic surgery.
sentences.chinese: 中国医疗系统的弊病绝不仅仅局限于美容整形外科。

sentences.english: Their role extends far beyond rough-and-tumble play, experts say.
sentences.chinese: 他们的角色远远不局限于乱七八糟的玩耍，专家说。

sentences.english: In the beginning, the models were restricted to open-type linkages.
sentences.chinese: 起初，这个模型是局限于开式连接。

sentences.english: B2B is the core business modus of Launcher, but not limit this.
sentences.chinese: B2B是当前朗趣的核心商业形式，但不局限于此。

sentences.english: The application of the NRG is not essentially limited to the pure impurity systems.
sentences.chinese: NRG的应用并不局限于单纯的量子杂质模型。

sentences.english: It is beyond this article to go into every aspect.
sentences.chinese: 它不仅仅局限于本文，还涉及每一个环节。

sentences.english: The chest pain was described as sharp, retrosternal in location, and radiating to the back.
sentences.chinese: 胸痛为局限于胸骨后的锐痛，放射至背部。

sentences.english: Blocking events are not restricted to Russia.
sentences.chinese: “阻塞事件”并未局限于俄罗斯。

sentences.english: And America needs China for a lot more than T-bonds.
sentences.chinese: 中国需要美国并不仅局限于购买国库券。

sentences.english: But this is often limited to small probing manoeuvres.
sentences.chinese: 但是，这往往局限于小的探查演练。

sentences.english: Practicing this simple little role play is only limited to your imagination.
sentences.chinese: 练习这种简单的角色游戏仅仅局限于你的想象。

sentences.english: The intellectual and political trends favoring deregulation were not limited to the United States.
sentences.chinese: 知识界和政界支持放松监管的趋势并不局限于美国。

sentences.english: limited to the satisfaction of certain basic needs.
sentences.chinese: 局限于满足特定的基本需求。

sentences.english: Drugs and weapons aren't the only contraband in prisons these days.
sentences.chinese: 如今，监狱中的违禁品不再局限于毒品和武器。

sentences.english: She confines her remarks to scientific management.
sentences.chinese: 她所讲的话仅局限于科学管理问题。

sentences.english: Unlike horse-racing, the contest is not restricted to thoroughbreds.
sentences.chinese: 不像赛马，该竞赛并不局限于纯种动物。

definition: to be limited to/to be confined to
to limit/to confine/to restrict sth within set boundaries
apart from/other than/except for/external/outside of/on the other side of/beyond
